mapper.select: select * from t_order t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and account=#{account} and status=#{status} and refundStatus=#{refundStatus} and paystatus=#{paystatus} and createdate >= #{startDate} and createdate <= #{endDate} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}

select count(*) from t_order where 1=1 and id=#{id} and account=#{account} and status=#{status} and refundStatus=#{refundStatus} and paystatus=#{paystatus} and createdate >= #{startDate} and createdate <= #{endDate}

select * from t_order t where 1=1 and id=#{id} and account=#{account} and status=#{status} and refundStatus=#{refundStatus} and paystatus=#{paystatus} and createdate >= #{startDate} and createdate <= #{endDate}
select t.id from t_order t where 1=1 and status='init' and paystatus='n' and createdate <= #{startDate}

SELECT date_format(t.createdate,'%Y%m') createdate,sum(t.amount) sumAmount FROM t_order t where 1=1 and t.paystatus='y' and t.createdate >= #{startDate} and t.createdate <= #{endDate} group by date_format(t.createdate,'%Y%m')

SELECT od.productID,od.productName,sum(od.number) productSellCount FROM t_order o,t_orderdetail od where 1=1 and o.id=od.orderid and o.paystatus='y' and o.createdate >= #{startDate} and o.createdate <= #{endDate} group by od.productID order by sum(od.number) desc
mapper.update: update t_order set id=#{id} ,status=#{status} ,refundStatus=#{refundStatus} ,paystatus=#{paystatus} ,amount=#{amount} ,updateAmount=#{updateAmount} ,fee=#{fee} ,account=#{account} ,rebate=#{rebate} ,remark=#{remark} ,expressCode=#{expressCode} ,expressName=#{expressName} ,expressNo=#{expressNo} ,expressCompanyName=#{expressCompanyName} ,confirmSendProductRemark=#{confirmSendProductRemark} ,closedComment=#{closedComment} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_order t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
select * from t_order t where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.delete: delete from t_order where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.update: update t_order set id=#{id},amount=#{amount},updateAmount=#{updateAmount},ptotal=#{ptotal},fee=#{fee} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where status='cancel') cancelCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where paystatus='n' and status='init') notPayCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where paystatus='y' and status='init') payButNotPassCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where paystatus='y' and status='pass') waitSendGoodsCount, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where refundStatus='WAIT_SELLER_AGREE') WAIT_SELLER_AGREE, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where refundStatus='SELLER_REFUSE_BUYER') SELLER_REFUSE_BUYER, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where refundStatus='WAIT_BUYER_RETURN_GOODS') WAIT_BUYER_RETURN_GOODS, (SELECT count(*) FROM t_order where refundStatus='WAIT_SELLER_CONFIRM_GOODS') WAIT_SELLER_CONFIRM_GOODS FROM t_systemsetting
